data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Los Lagos.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Los Lagos, Chile

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Los Lagos, Chile to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.section_summary: On average, 75 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Los Lagos, Chile.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who are far from you in Los Lagos. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Los Lagos, Chile.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Pashtun, Northern people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Los Lagos a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Lord, make the 176,731 believers in Los Lagos to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 590,969 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.section_summary:
the state of Los Lagos, Chile has a population of 767,700.

We estimate Los Lagos has 176,731 people who might know Jesus, 492,181 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 98,788 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Los Lagos an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

location.name: Los Lagos
location.cities_list: Puerto Montt, Osorno, Castro, Ancud, Puerto Varas
location.cities_list_w_pop: Puerto Montt (160,054), Osorno (135,773), Castro (29,926), Ancud (28,020), Puerto Varas (24,958)
